code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[recommendations,setRecommendations]=useState([]);const handleSubmit=async()=>{const response=await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/recommend',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({input})});const data=await response.json();setRecommendations(data.recommendations);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-xl w-full bg-white shadow-md rounded-xl p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-purple-700 mb-6 text-center",children:"\uD83C\uDFAC AI Recommendation Demo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"flex-1 p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg shadow-sm",type:"text",value:input,placeholder:"Enter your preference (e.g., music or movie)",onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-purple-600 text-white px-5 py-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-purple-700 transition",onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Get Recommendations"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-5 space-y-1 text-lg text-gray-700",children:recommendations.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:item},idx))})]})});}export default App;
